mapper.select: select t_ticket.ticket_id as ticketId, ticket_name as ticketName, ticket_price as ticketPrice, ticket_request as ticketRequest, ticket_tag as ticketTag, t_orderdetail.passenger_id as passengerId from t_ticket, t_orderdetail, t_order where t_order.order_id = t_orderdetail.order_id and t_orderdetail.ticket_id = t_ticket.ticket_id and t_ticket.spot_id = t_order.spot_id and t_order.order_id = #{id}
